attributes.action: Pay, the British Armed Forces  a salary equal to that of firemen, the police force and other public services. Arm and equip them adequately for the work that they do for Britain and overseas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pay the British Armed Forces a realistic wage for the work they do on our behalf at least equal to that of the Police, firemen and other public services. Also equip and arm them in the manner they require, not as the Treasury or MOD thinks is required.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Pay, the British Armed Forces a salary equal to that of firemen, the police force and other public services. Arm and equip them adequately for the work that they do for Britain and overseas."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14592.asp

Prime Minister's Office
